$schema.description: The URL of the JSON schema used to validate the plugin
$schema.title: JSON Schema

id.description: The unique ID of the plugin
id.title: Plugin ID

name.description: The unique name of the plugin
name.title: Plugin Name

description.description: A short summary describing what the plugin does
description.title: Plugin Description

homepage.description: The URL of the service the plugin is for. Used for linking to the service and for the plugin logo.
homepage.title: Plugin Homepage

required.description: Whether or not this property is required for the plugin to function
required.title: Required

title.description: The human-readable title of the property
title.title: Title

description.description: A brief description of what this property is used for
description.title: Description

example.description: An example value for this property
example.title: Example

additionalProperties.description: Defines a single property in the plugin configuration schema
additionalProperties.title: Configuration Property

configSchema.description: A list of properties that can be configured for the plugin
configSchema.title: Configuration Properties

variable.description: The name of the variable to store the extracted value in. This is only available inside the forEach step, and represents a single item. Defaults to `item`
variable.title: Variable

selector.description: The CSS selector to use to find the element
selector.title: Selector

selector.title: Selector

waitForSelector.description: The CSS selector to use to find the element
waitForSelector.title: Selector

waitForSelector.title: Selector

pagination.description: Defines how to paginate through the results
pagination.title: Pagination

attribute.title: Attribute

transform.title: Transform

selector.title: Selector

anyOf.title: Wait for Element
